promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a chibi cute legendary orca water-type with blue crystal skin. It can be found in ocean-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or orca. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crystallorca, a chibi cute legendary orca water-type pokemon. It can be found in ocean-like environments It has the following abilities: surging-strikes, tearful-look. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word orca or water or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, orca-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, sapphire blue galaxy background
generatedDescription: Crystallorca is a unique ocean dweller. It dances gracefully through waves, wistful and mysterious. Its magical strikes shock all who approach.
